alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 04 at 3:25AM HST until January 05 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI FROM 6 AM HST THURSDAY TO 6 PM HST FRIDAY... .A large northwest swell (320 degrees) will build to advisory levels through the day, along most north and west facing shores of the smaller islands. This swell will gradually decline Friday night through the weekend. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Surf building to 15 to 20 feet along north facing shores and 10 to 14 feet along west facing shores. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
